txt.en:
'The only thing keeping those trees at bay is the fear of my bow. I loosed every arrow at them, but now my quiver is empty.

'They press nearer and nearer. I think they begin to suspect that I am defenceless. Soon, they will be upon me.

'There is no hope left.'
'My... my arrows? Thank you, [placeholder], but you should not have done this. It is more than a cursed man deserves.\n\n'These arrows will only postpone my death by a short while.'
'Death shall not be far without arrows in my quiver.'
Léofmar loosed every arrow in his possession at the Huorns to keep them at bay, but he is now defenceless without a weapon.
Retrieved Léofmar's arrows from vicious Fangorn Huorns ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Retrieve Léofmar's arrows from vicious Fangorn Huorns ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Léofmar's arrows can be found on the vicious Fangorn Huorns nearby.\n\nYou should retrieve as many of Léofmar's arrows as you can to help him feel less defenceless.
Léofmar is where you left him, hiding against a log in the centre of Fangorn's eaves.\n\nYou should return Léofmar's arrows to him.
